title: Expansionary FP effect on PL and UE rate

content.description: If a government decides to implement an expansionary fiscal policy, what is most likely to happen to the price level and the unemployment rate in the short run if there is no crowding out?
content.question: Price LevelUnemployment RateAIncreaseIncreaseBIncreaseRemain the sameCIncreaseDecreaseDDecreaseIncreaseEDecreaseDecrease

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
